title: Trump and Lula hold phone call to discuss US tariffs on Brazil, sanctions
description: US president has warmed to Brazil's left-wing leader since imposing 50 percent tariffs on the South American country.
content: Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva and his United States counterpart Donald Trump have signalled that relations between their two countries are improving, after months of economic and poli… [+5601 chars]
